extensionAdditionalInfo.info: This extension contains actions for compiling Java source files and building projects using Ant and Maven.

actionInfo.name: Build Ant Project
actionInfo.summary: Builds an Ant project using a build file.

extensionAdditionalInfo.actionInfo:
This action builds a project using Ant.

Action Fields

Build File Path

The path of the file to build. This may be relative to the source directory or an absolute path.

Build Target

The Ant build target property. For example, build.

Build Properties

Any additional properties to pass to Ant (one per line). For example,
WarningLevel=2
Optimize=false

This action executes Javac to build one or more java source files.

Action Fields

Extension Paths

The relative paths of Java extensions required for compilation (one per line).

Additional Arguments

Any additional arguments to pass to Javac (one per line).

This action executes a Maven script.

Action Fields

Maven Path

The path to the maven executable.

Goals/Phases

The goals and/or phases of the Maven build, separated by spaces.

Additional Arguments

Any additional arguments to pass to Maven (one per line).

This action updates the version element in a pom.xml file.

Action Fields

File Masks

The file masks to update.

Recursive

Apply recursivly to all subdirectories.

Version

The version number to update the element value to.
